advancement.shulker_blast.title: Master of Shulker Blasts
advancement.shulker_shell.title: Shulker's Gift
advancement.too_many_bows.ancient_sage.d: Discover the power of the Ancient Sage.
advancement.too_many_bows.frostbite.desc: Wield the chilling power of the Frostbite Bow
advancement.too_many_bows.master_bow_col: Collect every unique bow in the Too Many Bows mod.
advancement.too_many_bows.necro_flame_bo: Wield the power of the Necro Flame Bow.
advancement.too_many_bows.repair.descrip: Use this crystal to repair your bows on an anvil...
advancement.too_many_bows.repair.title: Power Crystal
advancement.too_many_bows.root.descripti: Begin your journey to become a master archer by obtaining your first bow.
advancement.too_many_bows.root.title: Too Many Bows
advancement.too_many_bows.sage_bow.descr: Unleash the wisdom of the Ancient Sage Bow
advancement.too_many_bows.sage_bow.title: Ancient Sage's Legacy
enchantment.too_many_bows.ricochet.desc: Allows arrows to ricochet off more surfaces for the Astral Bound Bow only.
enchantment.too_many_bows.spectral.desc: Allows arrows to pass through additional obstacles.
item.many_bows.ancient_sage_bow.tooltip: An ancient weapon of unmatched power.
Only the wise can wield its true might.
item.many_bows.arcane_bow.tooltip: Unleashes a mystical spread of arrows with arcane energy.
item.many_bows.arcane_bow.tooltip.abilit: Ability: Fires three arrows in a spread pattern, dealing extra arcane damage.
item.many_bows.arcane_bow.tooltip.legend: Ancient secrets lie within its enchanted limbs...
item.many_bows.aurora_bow.item_use: You need Rift Shards to use this bow!
item.many_bows.aurora_bow.no_rift_shard: You need a Rift shard to fire this bow!
item.many_bows.aurora_bow.tooltip: A bow infused with celestial energy.
item.many_bows.aurora_bow.tooltip.abilit: Harness the power of the rift.
item.many_bows.aurora_bow.tooltip.extend: This bow requires both arrows and Rift Shards to fire.
item.many_bows.crimson_nexus.tooltip: A bow pulsing with crimson energy.
item.many_bows.crimson_nexus.tooltip.abi: Fires energy arrows that consume health and lifedrain nearby foes.
item.many_bows.crimson_nexus.tooltip.inf: Consumes health to fire powerful arrows.
item.many_bows.crimson_nexus.tooltip.leg: Master its power, but beware its toll.
item.many_bows.cursed_stone.tooltip.info: Used to craft the Necro Bow
item.many_bows.dragons_breath_bow.toolti: Fires a charged arrow that spawns dragon's breath upon impact.
item.many_bows.dusk_reaper.no_soul_fragm: You need Soul Fragments to fire this bow!
item.many_bows.dusk_reaper.tooltip.debuf: Applies Weakness, Slowness, and constant damage to marked targets.
item.many_bows.dusk_reaper.tooltip.effec: Marked enemies explode on death, dealing AoE damage.
item.many_bows.dusk_reaper.tooltip.glow: Marked enemies are visible through walls.
item.many_bows.dusk_reaper.tooltip.mark: Marked enemies take increased damage and leave a damaging trail.
item.many_bows.dusk_reaper.tooltip.spect: Fully charged shots create a spectral zone that damages and slows enemies.
item.many_bows.ethereal_hunter.no_hunger: You are too hungry to fire the bow!
item.many_bows.ethereal_hunter.tooltip.i: A mystical bow that fires radiant arrows fueled by your hunger.
item.many_bows.ethereal_hunter.tooltip.l: Harnesses your energy to unleash powerful attacks.
item.many_bows.frostbite_bow.tooltip: A bow forged from the chilling essence of ice.
item.many_bows.frostbite_bow.tooltip.abi: Shoots frost arrows that slow and freeze enemies on full charge.
item.many_bows.frostbite_bow.tooltip.fro: Applies Frost Walker effect when pulling back bow.
item.many_bows.icicle_javelin_bow.toolti: A bow imbued with the power of freezing winds.
Fires icicle javelins that pierce enemies.
item.many_bows.radiance.no_experience: This bow requires XP to fire!
item.many_bows.radiance.tooltip: A bow blessed by celestial light.
item.many_bows.radiance.tooltip.ability: Radiant energy damages undead, heals allies, and blinds foes.
item.many_bows.radiance.tooltip.info: Consumes experience points to fire radiant arrows.
item.many_bows.repair_crystal.tooltip.us: Use in an anvil to repair bows.
item.many_bows.rift_shard.tooltip.use: Use to infuse the Aurora's Grace bow arrows powerful enough to be fired.
item.many_bows.scatter_bow.tooltip: A bow that shoots arrows in all directions
item.many_bows.solar_bow.tooltip: §eA powerful bow charged by the sun
item.many_bows.solar_bow.tooltip.ability: §cShoots flaming solar arrows on full charge.
item.many_bows.soulfragment.tooltip.info: Used to fire the Dusk Reaper bow
item.many_bows.twin_shadows.tooltip: A bow imbued with the essence of light and shadow.
item.many_bows.twin_shadows.tooltip.abil: Fires twin arrows: one of light and one of darkness.
item.many_bows.verdant_vigor.tooltip: A bow imbued with the essence of nature.
item.many_bows.verdant_vigor.tooltip.abi: Holding this bow grants health and heals nearby allies.
item.many_bows.verdant_vigor.tooltip.leg: Legends speak of its power to breathe life into barren lands.
item.too_many_bows.arc_heavens.tooltip: Unleash the power of the storm.
item.too_many_bows.arc_heavens.tooltip.a: Strikes foes with lightning on a direct hit.
item.too_many_bows.astral_bow.details: This bow fires arrows that ricochet, enchant with Ricochet for more surfaces.
item.too_many_bows.burnt_relic.tooltip1: Once used by Ancient Gods, still holds a flicker of power...
item.too_many_bows.cursed_flame_bow.tool: A bow imbued with cursed flames, known to halt regeneration and burn with inextinguishable fury.
Ignites foes with cursed fire: blocks all regen, can't be extinguished by water, and deals a heart of damage per tick.
item.too_many_bows.emerald_sage_bow.tool: Grants bonus XP upon hitting enemies
item.too_many_bows.flame_bow.tooltip.abi: Shoots flaming arrows that cause fiery explosions.
item.too_many_bows.flame_bow.tooltip.leg: A legendary bow forged in the heart of a volcano.
item.too_many_bows.ironclad_bow.tooltip: Forged with iron, tempered in battle
Magnetic Pulse: Pulls enemies towards the point of impact of arrow..
item.too_many_bows.sonic_bow.tooltip: Harness the destructive force of the Warden's roar
item.too_many_bows.sonic_bow.tooltip.abi: Shoots a powerful shockwave that pierces enemies with immense force
item.too_many_bows.sonic_bow.tooltip.leg: Forged from the echoes of the Deep Dark, this bow unleashes pure devastation.
item.too_many_bows.spectral_whisper.deta: This bow fires spectral arrows that pass through blocks, damaging entities.
item.too_many_bows.spectral_whisper.tool: Arrows pierce through the first obstacle.
item.too_many_bows.tidal_bow.tooltip: The power of the ocean flows through this bow.
item.too_many_bows.tidal_bow.tooltip.abi: You are able to shoot arrows underwater as normal arrows.
item.too_many_bows.tidal_bow.tooltip.leg: A bow that harnesses the ancient power of the seas, you get a 2.5 damage multi underwater.
item.too_many_bows.torchbearer_bow.effec: Shoots fire arrows that place torches upon impact.
item.too_many_bows.torchbearer_bow.shift: Ignites enemies and lights your path.
item.too_many_bows.torchbearer_bow.toolt: Holding the bow gives off light.
item.too_many_bows.verdant_viper_bow.too: A bow that harnesses the venom of nature.
Shoots arrows that leave behind a poisonous cloud.
It is said this bow was forged from the fangs of the great serpent king.
item.too_many_bows.vitality_weaver.detai: Leeching Arrows: Arrows steal health from enemies and heal the shooter.
item.too_many_bows.vitality_weaver.toolt: A bow imbued with the power of life and death.
item.too_many_bows.webstring_volley.deta: Shoots 5 arrows in a spread pattern, applying slowness to targets.
item.too_many_bows.webstring_volley.tool: Unleash a volley of arrows in a wide spread.
item.too_many_bows.wind_bow.tooltip: Harness the power of the wind
item.too_many_bows.wind_bow.tooltip.effe: Draw the bow to move swiftly; enemies hit may be lifted skyward
item.too_many_bows.wind_bow.tooltip.lege: Ancient whispers say this bow was crafted from a storm's fury
